content:
Hi All
Just want details about Provenance profile.Is it required to have Provenance profile for payer to payer exchange .
This would be better asked in the #Da Vinci PDex channel
This topic was moved here from #social > Provenance profile by Josh Mandel.
I'll say yes. 2 reasons, 1) the ig is stacked on top of us core and us core requires them 2) They added an attribute that is must support.
